attributes.action: Remove the traffic chicane on Plantation Road, Redcar, TS10
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to remove the traffic chicane on Plantation Road, Redcar, TS10.

The current implementation of the chicane and changed "right of way" is going to cause more accidents than it prevents.

If you are travelling East towards Mickle Dales from the Larkswood Road bend, the chicane does not prevent accidents as you then have about 600m or so to really speed up before the roundabout.
In fact, people speed up along Larkswood Rd as they know they 'now' have right of way (as of a few months ago, as a result of the mysterious changed priority).

If you're coming West from Mickle Dales you have 600m or so of speeding right next to the cycle route before having to brake...
BUT as you cannot see around the bend into Larkswood Rd one is encouraged to try and get through the chicane quickly...

Before long, SOMEONE is going to have an accident either injuring a kid, destroying cars, or driving through the living room of the poor resident in the end house...

The chicane (and newly changed priority) is poorly planned, unnecessary and causes unnecessary delays, pollution and noise.

It should be completely removed and one more pair of 'sleeping policemen' put where the chicane now stands.
